amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC.___.None of the funds made available by this Act may be used in contravention of the War Powers Resolution (50 U.S.C. 1541 et seq.).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of the War Powers Resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 316 - 111 (Roll no. 518).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 316 - 111 (Roll no. 518).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Sherman.
